title: Mikheil Kavelashvili condemns Sydney attack, expresses condolences to victims - Georgia Today
snippet: December 15, 2025 · in Politics, Social & Society · Reading Time: 2 mins read · Mikheil Kavelashvili strongly condemned the deadly shooting that took place at Bondi Beach in Sydney, describing the incident as a terrorist attack and expressing ...

title: Mikheil Kavelashvili signs legislative amendments on assemblies and demonstrations - Georgia Today
snippet: December 12, 2025 · in Highlights, Politics, Social & Society · Reading Time: 1 min read · Mikheil Kavelashvili has signed into law the recently adopted amendments regulating assemblies and demonstrations.

title: Georgia’s Kavelashvili defends 2024 vote amid EU strains | Muscat Daily| Oman News |Business | Sports |Lifestyle
snippet: Tuesday, December 09 · 11:47 AM · Subscribe · E-paper · 1 Dec 2025 · Tbilisi, Georgia – Georgia has grappled with political tension and months of street protests, but President Mikheil Kavelashvili defended the legitimacy of the country’s 2024 parliamentary elections and its path to become an European Union (EU) member.

title: Georgia: Ex-footballer Mikheil Kavelashvili named president
snippet: Georgia's outgoing pro-Western president, Salome Zourabichvili, has condemned Kavelashvili's election as a travesty, insisting she holds Georgia's only remaining legitimate institution. ... Prime Minister Irakli Kobakhidze has accused Zourabichvili of trying to harm Georgia's interests, emphasising that when her term of office ends on 29 December, she will have to retire.
